snippet: Dentists nationwide are seeing more preschoolers at all income levels with 6 to 10 cavities or more.
abstract: Dentists nationwide are seeing more preschoolers at all income levels with 6 to 10 cavities or more, and say that the level of decay is so severe and the work so extensive that they often recommend using general anesthesia; some factors that contribute to the growing problem include endless snacking and juice or other sweets at bedtime and a lack of awareness that infants should visit a dentist by age 1.
lead_paragraph: Dentists nationwide are seeing more preschoolers at all income levels with 6 to 10 cavities or more.

headline.seo: Rise in Preschool Cavities Prompts Anesthesia Use
headline.main: Preschoolers in Surgery for a Mouthful of Cavities
headline.print_headline: Young and in Surgery for a Mouthful of Cavities
